name: Green Rising Marketing
description:
Our purpose is to fuel the green movement by starting conversations that mean something.  We envision a healthier world where socially conscious becomes socially subconscious.
We are a practical, hands-on strategy house that will drive your brand from purpose to product.  We'll help you identify your voice, and will fiercely guard your brand and help it stand in integrity, all the while working to find customers who love you just the way you are.  The loyal kind.
